coll-book_creator_intro: <big>Plus de ''book creator'' you fi create book wey dey contain wiki pages for your choice. You fi export de book for different formats inside (for example PDF or ODF) or order printed copy.</big>
coll-book_creator_help: Spy [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|de help page sake of books]] for more info.
coll-book_creator_disable_text: Dem go disable ''Book creator'' den dem go remove de book wey you dey job for top.
coll-unknown_subpage_text: Dis subpage for [[Special:Book|Book]] no dey exist
coll-couldnotaddarticle_msg: Dem no fi add de wiki page.
coll-couldnotremovearticle_title: Dem no fi comot wiki page
coll-couldnotremovearticle_msg: Dem no fi comot de wiki page.
coll-download_text: To download your book make you choose format den click de button.
coll-download_as_text: To download your book for $1 inside format click de button.
coll-drag_and_drop: Use drag & drop to reorder wiki pages den chapters
coll-notitle_msg: Dem no fi determine de title for de page.
coll-request_failed_msg: Na error dey while dem attempt to render your book.
coll-save_collection_text: Choose storage location give your book:
coll-save_category: Dem go add all saved books go de category [[:Category:{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}|{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}]].
coll-overwrite_text:
Page plus de name [[:$1]] dey exist already.
You want say make dem replace am plus your book?
coll-load_overwrite_text:
You get sum pages for your book inside already.
You want make dem overwrite your current book, append de fresh content, or cancel dey load dis book?
coll-limit_exceeded_text:
Your book bola too much.
Dem no fi add more pages.
coll-rendering_text:
We beg wedge while dem dey generate de document.

Progress: $1% $2

Dis page for automatically refresh every few seconds. If dis no dey job, we beg make you press your browser hin refresh button.
coll-rendering_finished_text: Dem generate de document file. [$1 Download de file] for your computer top.
coll-rendering_finished_note_not_satisfi: No satisfy plus de output? Spy [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|de helppage about books]] give possibilities to improve am.
coll-rendering_finished_note_article_rdf: Currently sum documents no dey contain tables. Alternative dem fi use de $1, select "Print" for de browser menu inside, den make you use de "Save as PDF" option.
coll-rendering_failed_text:
Generation for de document file fail.

$1
coll-notfound_text: Dem no fit find book page.
coll-download_notfound_text:
De file you dey try download no dey exist:
Maybe dem delete am wey dem need to regenerate am.
coll-is_cached: • Dem find cached version for de document, so no rendering be necessary. [$1 Force re-rendering].
coll-book_title: Order am as book dem print
coll-book_text: Get book dem print from wanna print-on-demand partner.
coll-invalid_podpartner_msg:
De supplied POD partner be invalid.
We beg make you contact your MediaWiki administrator.
coll-suggest_title: Dem suggest books give your book
coll-suggest_intro_text: Dem base suggestions for de current set of wiki pages top for your book inside. Dem update de list wenever you click for de add or remove buttons top.
coll-suggest_ban_tooltip: Comot dis page from de list of suggestions
coll-suggest_article_ban: Dem comot page $1 from de suggestions ($2).
coll-suggest_article_add: Dem add page $1 come your book ($2).
coll-suggest_article_remove: Dem comot page $1 from your book ($2).
coll-load_local_book: Click "OK" so say you go continue plus your book $1 wey dey contain $2 wiki {{PLURAL:$2|page|pages}}. Click "Cancel" so say e go delete am den start plus empty book.
coll-download_as_tooltip: Download $1 version for dis wiki page
coll-book_creator_disable_tooltip: Shun dey use de book creator
coll-add_linked_article: Add de wiki page dem link come your book
coll-remove_linked_article: Comot de wiki page dem link from your book
coll-add_category: Add dis category come your book
coll-add_category_tooltip: Add all wiki pages for dis category inside come your book
coll-add_this_page: Add dis page come your book
coll-add_page_tooltip: Add de current wiki page come your book
coll-clear_collection_confirm: You really want completely clear your book?
coll-clear_collection_tooltip: Comot all wiki pages from your current book
coll-help_tooltip: Show help about books dem dey create
coll-load_collection_tooltip: Load dis book as your current book
coll-remove_this_page: Comot dis page from your book
coll-remove_page_tooltip: Comot de current wiki page from your book
coll-show_collection_tooltip: Click so say you go edit/download/order your book
coll-not_addable: Dem no fi add dis page
coll-make_suggestions_tooltip: Show suggestions dem base for de pages top for your book inside
coll-attribution-page:
Text den image sources, contributors, den licenses

Text

$1

Images

$2

Content license

$3
coll-warning-disable-pdf-text: Sake of severe issues plus wanna system wey dey exist, de Book Creator no longer go support book wey dem dey save as PDF.
coll-notice-download-pdf-text: While dem disable de Book Creator PDF wey dem render, you fi try '''''Download as PDF''''' from de sidebar tools give individual articles.
coll-rendererror-no-session: Dem no find book definition for session inside. Dem fi discard am sake of inactivity.
coll-rendererror-pdf: Dem fail PDF wey dem dey render: $1
coll-rendererror-fetch: Dem fail $1 wey dem dey fetch: $2
coll-rendererror-fetch-wrapper: Errors come while dem dey try fetch page contents: $1
coll-rendererror-no-cache: Dem no find book data for cache inside. Dis likely fi be error for de software inside.
